News.headline: Match Officials: Forest Green Rovers v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Officials: Forest Green Rovers v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Forest Green Rovers v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Saturday's referee for the Daggers' Vanarama National League away game at Forest Green Rovers has been named as Stephen Ross.
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Alexander Fisher and Scott Jackson with the fourth official being James Robinson.

Ticket information for the game can be foundÂ here.
